meanings.definition: Capable of being written on or inscribed
meanings.sent1: The notebook paper is writeable with a pencil.
meanings.sent2: The whiteboard is writeable with dry-erase markers.
meanings.sent3: The writeable surface of the chalkboard made the teacher's handwriting look artistic.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a blank canvas, waiting for ideas to become writeable thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The writeable tablet allowed the artist to sketch freely without wasting paper.

meanings.definition: Able to be modified or updated by writing
meanings.sent1: The document is writeable, so you can make changes easily.
meanings.sent2: The digital file is writeable, allowing for quick edits.
meanings.sent3: The writeable contract made it simple to adjust the terms as needed.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was a writeable page, open to new experiences and emotions.
meanings.sent5: The writeable software lets users customize their settings to suit their preferences.

meanings.definition: Suitable for writing on or with a writing implement
meanings.sent1: The smooth surface of the paper is writeable with a pen.
meanings.sent2: The notebook is writeable, making it perfect for jotting down notes.
meanings.sent3: The writeable label on the jar helped identify its contents easily.
meanings.sent4: His memory was a writeable slate, ready to record new information.
meanings.sent5: The writeable index cards are great for organizing thoughts and ideas.
